articles.description: Ange Postecoglou opted for a more cautious approach over his usual swashbuckling style of football as Tottenham beat Manchester United to win the Europa League.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou ditches 'Ange-ball' to win Europa League with Spurs

articles.description: Manchester United will keep faith with boss Ruben Amorim after their Europa League final loss - but for how long?
articles.title: Tottenham 1-0 Man Utd: What next for Ruben Amorim after Europa League final loss?

articles.description: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou insists he wants to stay in charge and says he had not "completed the job" after he guided Spurs to their first trophy in 17 years.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Trophy does not complete Tottenham job, says Spurs boss

articles.description: "I always win things in my second year," said Ange Postecoglou, who led Tottenham to Europa League success with a 1-0 win over Manchester United in Bilbao.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: What trophies did he win in second seasons with his clubs?

articles.description: Who impressed and who did not in the Europa League final between Tottenham and Manchester United? BBC Sport senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel rates the players.
articles.title: Europa League final: Tottenham and Manchester United's players rated

articles.description: Hayley Matthews' unbeaten century for West Indies is in vain as Sophia Dunkley helps England cruise to an eight-wicket win in the first T20 at Canterbury.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Sophia Dunkley leads hosts to eight-wicket win despite Hayley Matthews century

articles.description: Organisers of a controversial event allowing banned performance-enhancing drugs say a swimmer has broken a long-standing world record.
articles.title: Enhanced Games: Doped swimmer claims 50m freestyle 'world record'

articles.description: Richard Carapaz launches a late attack to take victory on stage 11 of the Giro d'Italia on Wednesday, as overall leader Isaac del Toro finishes second.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Richard Carapaz wins stage 11 as Isaac del Tor retains pink jersey

articles.description: BBC Sport's AMA team take a look at whether Monaco has lost its charm and place in the jam-packed season.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Has F1's iconic race become boring?

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Phil Foden says he has "struggled" this season because of off-field issues and an ankle injury suffered against Manchester United.
articles.title: Phil Foden: Man City midfielder say struggles down to off-field issues and injury
